subject: Approval of bids for award of works under BOT (Annuity) mode
text: HRd4 <7fl4 <TTHTf gfadrur TrMy /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 "A /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (er Waa7t &r roarif #ATr4) QR: Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 61-5 u 6, #rr-10, ETTT, # f7 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn. 31st March 2011 POLICY MATTER Technical (75/2011) (Decision taken in 82nd Meeting of the Authority held on 27.1.2011 vide Agenda Item No.V) Sub: Approval of Bids for award of works under BOT (Annuity) mode: The matter relating to delegation of power to Chairman regarding award of Annuity projects was discussed in detail in the 82nd Meeting of the Authority held on 27.1.2011 and it was decided that where there has been sufficient competition number of bids received are three Or more (as also provided in the case of BOT (Toll) projects) , and the annuity quoted by the preferred bidder is less than the annuity amount approved by the PPPAC, the projects may be awarded with the approval of the Chairman: 2. The above decision of the Authority is circulated for information and for being followed in procurement projects in future. Lewou (M: Chandrashekhar) GM (Coordination) To All Officers at HQ All PDs AII EDs ROs Copy for information to: PS to Chairman AIl Member/CVO Ht T 7 _ NHAL i.e.
